definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to catch up with/to keep pace with
not able to keep up with
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
to stand firmly/to gain a foothold/to establish oneself

sentences.english: Blaine stopped to chat with a friend and Guiteau saw his chance.
sentences.chinese: 布莱恩停下来跟一位朋友聊天，吉特奥看到了机会。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: And who can argue with Orwell?
sentences.chinese: 谁可以跟奥维尔争论呢？

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能开一张不可撤消的跟单信用证吗？

sentences.english: Tom is an easygoing type of person who gets along well with everyone.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆是那种随和的人，跟谁都合得来。

sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房里，梁大妈继续跟马母说着当年的事。

sentences.english: "The software company did not charge us too much, " says Feng.
sentences.chinese: “那家软件公司也没跟我们要很多钱，”冯说。

sentences.english: You and your agent are looking like hogs about now.
sentences.chinese: 你跟你的经纪人现在看起来就像肥猪。

sentences.english: A gaggle of schoolgirls followed the tennis star to his car.
sentences.chinese: 一群叽哩呱啦的女学生跟著网球明星到他的车子。

sentences.english: But here I am and there you are and it is the moment of and for Veritas.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我还是要站在这儿，跟你们聊聊。

sentences.english: Generally, travel agencies out there with a travel agency liability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，跟旅行社出游会有一份旅行社责任险。
她还跟那个异教徒一起么？

sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吴昭仪也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: Let me talk to my girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我得跟我的女朋友谈谈。

sentences.english: He is always tell the director how to run the business; that's like teach his grandmother to suck egg.
sentences.chinese: 他老是对总裁说该如何管理业务，就跟班门弄斧似的。

sentences.english: A depressive disorder is not the same as a passing blue mood.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁障碍跟一晃而过的忧郁情绪还不一样。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
